prompts.name: ultrathink

prompts.name: ship
prompts.description: Complete workflow from specification to shipped pull request

prompts.name: flesh
prompts.description: Transform vague tasks into executable specifications with specific files, approach, and success criteria

prompts.description: Execute the next task from TODO.md with direct tactical focus

prompts.description: Integrated manual QA with inline debugging and fix tracking

prompts.name: pr-ready

prompts.name: ousterhout
prompts.description: Apply Ousterhout's software design principles to detect shallow modules, information leakage, and complexity red flags

prompts.name: testing
prompts.description: Apply testing philosophy - test behavior not implementation, minimize mocks, AAA structure

slash.name: doctor
slash.description: Comprehensive health check for Codex CLI environment
